statements: SELECT * FROM StudentGrades;
SELECT student_name, grade_math FROM StudentGrades;
SELECT student_name, grade_math, grade_science FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_math > 80;
SELECT student_name, grade_math, grade_science, grade_history FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_science < 70;
SELECT student_name, grade_history FROM StudentGrades ORDER BY grade_history DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_math > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_history FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_science < 70 ORDER BY student_id ASC, grade_history DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_math, grade_science FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_history IS NULL ORDER BY grade_math DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_history FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_math + grade_science >= 150 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_math, grade_science, grade_history FROM StudentGrades WHERE grade_math <> grade_science ORDER BY grade_math DESC, grade_science ASC, grade_history DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_content, report_date FROM report_cards WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade = 12 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY grade DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_content, report_date FROM report_cards WHERE report_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students INNER JOIN report_cards ON students.student_id = report_cards.student_id WHERE grade > 10 ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade BETWEEN 9 AND 11 ORDER BY grade DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM Course;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Student JOIN GradeReport ON Student.student_id = GradeReport.student_id JOIN Course ON Course.course_id = GradeReport.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student JOIN GradeReport ON Student.student_id = GradeReport.student_id WHERE Course.course_id = 1 ORDER BY grade ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Student JOIN GradeReport ON Student.student_id = GradeReport.student_id JOIN Course ON GradeReport.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE Student.grade >= 70 ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Student JOIN GradeReport ON Student.student_id = GradeReport.student_id JOIN Course ON GradeReport.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE Student.grade BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY grade DESC, student_name ASC, course_name ASC;

SELECT Student.student_name, Course.course_name, GradeReport.grade FROM Student JOIN GradeReport ON Student.student_id = GradeReport.student_id JOIN Course ON GradeReport.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%' AND grade > 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_name ASC, grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, report_date FROM report_cards WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 4;
SELECT name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(grade) >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM teachers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT first_name, last_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT report_card_id, student_id, report_date, average_grade FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
